import{io}from"socket.io-client";export const socketClient=io("http://localhost:5000",{withCredentials:true,autoConnect:false,extraHeaders:{"my-custom-header":"abcd"}});socketClient.on("tests",str=>{console.log(str);});socketClient.on("online friend",user=>{console.log("online friend",user.nickname);});socketClient.on("offline friend",user=>{console.log("offline friend",user.nickname);// console.log("offline friend", user);
});
